mapper.sql: id, biz_id, train_id, user_id, is_finish_file, read_time, state, begin_time, answer, des, start_date, end_date, finish_time, is_finish_questions, train_name, type_id, user_exam_total, point_str, start_read_time, is_deleted, creator, creator_id, gmt_created, modifier, modifier_id, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select usr.dsp_name AS dspName,tusr.user_id AS userId,file.file_id AS fileId, tusr.train_name AS trainName,tusr.train_id AS trainId,config.pass_point AS passPoint, tusr.point_str AS pointStr,config.total_point AS totalPoint,tusr.finish_time AS finishTime from tb_dtms_train_user tusr left join tb_dtms_qms_user usr on tusr.user_id = usr.biz_id LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_train_config config ON tusr.train_id = config.biz_Id left join tb_dtms_train_files file on tusr.train_id = file.biz_Id WHERE tusr.is_deleted = 0 and usr.is_deleted = 0 and config.is_deleted = 0 and file.is_deleted = 0
and any_value(usr.dsp_name) concat('%',#{dspName},'%') or any_value(usr.account) concat('%',#{dspName},'%')
and any_value(tusr.train_name) concat('%',#{trainName},'%')
and any_value(tusr.user_exam_total) >= config.pass_point
and any_value(tusr.user_exam_total) < config.pass_point
and any_value(tusr.user_id) in
#{item}
and tusr.biz_id = #{bizId}
order by any_value(tusr.gmt_created) desc

select train.biz_id AS bizId, usr.dsp_name AS dspName, exam.exam_id AS examId, exam.exam_duration AS examDuration, config.total_point AS totalPoint, config.pass_point AS passPoint, train.point_str AS pointStr, train.answer AS answer, train.des AS des, questions.questions_type_id AS questionsTypeId, questions.question_title AS questionTitle, questions.question_content AS questionContent, questions.question_a AS questionA, questions.question_b AS questionB, questions.question_c AS questionC, questions.question_d AS questionD, questions.question_e AS questionE, questions.question_f AS questionF from tb_dtms_train_user train LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_qms_user usr ON train.user_id = usr.biz_id LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_exam_user_plan_model exam ON train.user_id = exam.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_train_config config ON train.train_id = config.biz_id LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_questions questions ON train.type_id = questions.exam_type_id WHERE is_finish_questions = 0 and train.is_deleted = 0 and usr.is_deleted = 0 and config.is_deleted = 0 and questions.is_deleted = 0 order by any_value(train.gmt_created) desc

select tusr.biz_id AS bizId, tusr.type_id AS typeId, tusr.is_finish_file AS isFinishFile, tusr.read_time AS readTime, tusr.is_finish_questions AS isFinishQuestions, tusr.finish_time AS finishTime, tusr.point_str AS pointStr, tusr.state AS state, tusr.begin_time AS beginTime, tusr.end_date AS endDate, config.pass_point AS passPoint, config.train_name AS trainName from tb_dtms_train_user tusr LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_train_config config ON tusr.train_id = config.biz_id WHERE tusr.is_deleted = 0 and config.is_deleted = 0 order by tusr.gmt_created desc

select usr.dsp_name AS dspName,tusr.user_id AS userId, config.exam_name AS examName,tusr.train_id AS trainId,config.pass_point AS passPoint, tusr.point_str AS pointStr,config.total_point AS totalPoint,tusr.finish_time AS finishTime from tb_dtms_train_user tusr left join tb_dtms_qms_user usr on tusr.user_id = usr.biz_id LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_train_config config ON tusr.train_id = config.biz_Id WHERE tusr.is_deleted = 0 and usr.is_deleted = 0 and config.is_deleted = 0
and any_value(usr.dsp_name) concat('%',#{dspName},'%') or any_value(usr.account) concat('%',#{dspName},'%')
and any_value(tusr.train_name) concat('%',#{trainName},'%')
and any_value(tusr.user_exam_total) >= config.pass_point
and any_value(tusr.user_exam_total) < config.pass_point
and any_value(tusr.user_id) in
#{item}
and tusr.biz_id = #{bizId}
order by any_value(tusr.gmt_created) desc

SELECT config.exam_id AS examId, exam.exam_name AS examName, exam.exam_duration AS examDuration, config.pass_point AS passPoint FROM tb_dtms_train_config config LEFT JOIN tb_dtms_exam_model exam ON config.exam_id = exam.biz_id WHERE config.biz_id IN ( SELECT train_id FROM tb_dtms_train_user WHERE is_deleted = 0 and biz_id = #{bizId} )
